page.title: 06Debenham Fire Service.
page.content: Debenham has a part-time or retained fire crew,maintained by Suffolk Fire Service.Each fireman has a pocket alerter which bleeps when there is a fire.The Debenham fire appliance serves twenty surrounding parishes.It responds to about 90 call-outs a year,very irregularly spaced. The emphasis has steadily changed from fire-fighting alone to rescue duties after car crashes,special service attendances at chemical incidents and the rescue of animals.Malicious alarms are almost unknown in Debenham. Present crew members are:-Sub-officer Smith(Joiner and Undertaker);Leading Firemen Bufton(Headmaster)and Boulton (Newsagent);Firemen Woods(Engineer), Balaam(Warehouse Foreman),Harvey (ELectrician),Woods(Telephone Research Engineer),Pearson(Vicar),Hutt(Silver- smith),Sheffield(Artist),Turner(Chef).
